title: Various Fixes
message:
Various Fixes

 - Event list no longer crashes if refreshing during a screen
re-orientation (and retains pre-fetched data if screen is rotated)

 - Events can be ack'd "in the background". It was always done on a
background thread but had a foreground dialog box preventing you from
doing anything else. This has been replaced with additional threading
and a small spinner surrounding the nack/ack image
